title: Fragment, late 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of dark red velvet with an uncut ground and design in cut pile. Small pattern of swinging branches and leaves forming ogive-shaped areas, in each a highly formalized floral motif.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 16th century.
late 16th century. Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet). Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1921-22-24.
